Microsoft.DataApiBuilder 1.7.81-rc+c7927fa9885160ed35bcc9b25b13fd59b88f3133
c Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

  --graphql                        Export GraphQL schema

  -o, --output                     Required. Specify the directory where the
                                   schema file will be saved. This option is
                                   required.

  -g, --graphql-schema-file        Specify the filename for the exported GraphQL
                                   schema.(Default is:'schema.gql').

  --generate                       Generates a schema file from the specified
                                   Azure Cosmos DB database.

  -m, --sampling-mode              Specifies the sampling mode to use. Available
                                   modes include:
                                   - TopNExtractor: Retrieves a specified number
                                   of recent records from an Azure Cosmos DB
                                   container, optionally filtering by a maximum
                                   number of days.
                                   - EligibleDataSampler: Retrieves a specified
                                   number of records, using a given partition
                                   key, from an Azure Cosmos DB container. The
                                   number of records per partition and the time
                                   range are configurable.
                                   - TimePartitionedSampler: Retrieves a
                                   specified number of records by dividing the
                                   container data and time range into subranges,
                                   then selects the top N records from each
                                   subrange based on a given configuration.
                                   

  -n, --sampling-count             Specify the total number of samples to
                                   retrieve for each sampling modes:
                                   - TopNExtractor: Total number of records to
                                   select.
                                   - EligibleDataSampler: Number of records to
                                   retrieve from each partition.
                                   - TimePartitionedSampler: Number of records
                                   to retrieve per time range group.

  --sampling-partition-key-path    Specify the partition key path. This option
                                   is applicable only when the
                                   'EligibleDataSampler' mode is selected.

  -d, --sampling-days              Specify the number of days to fetch data.
                                   Sampling modes include:
                                   - TopNExtractor: Limits records to the most
                                   recent days.
                                   - EligibleDataSampler: Limits records from
                                   each partition to the specified number of
                                   days.
                                   - TimePartitionedSampler: Gathers data over
                                   the specified number of days and divides it
                                   into subranges.

  --sampling-group-count           Specify the number of groups for sampling.
                                   This option is applicable only when the
                                   'TimePartitionedSampler' mode is selected.

  -c, --config                     Path to config file. Defaults to
                                   'dab-config.json' unless
                                   'dab-config.<DAB_ENVIRONMENT>.json' exists,
                                   where DAB_ENVIRONMENT is an environment
                                   variable.

  --help                           Display this help screen.

  --version                        Display version information.
